theses.title: AI Destroys Traditional Software Value
theses.implications: BEARISH on pure SaaS (CRM, ADBE, TEAM). BULLISH on AI infrastructure (NVDA, cloud). BULLISH on companies with unique DATA moats.
theses.invalidation: AI coding tools plateau; enterprise adoption slower than expected; regulatory barriers.
theses.description: AI coding tools fundamentally destroy the moat of traditional software companies. Code is becoming commoditized. SaaS companies with no defensible data moat are walking dead.

theses.title: The Age of Personal AI Agents
theses.implications: BULLISH on compute (NVDA, AMD, hyperscalers). BEARISH on human-labor-intensive service companies.
theses.invalidation: Public backlash; regulation limiting autonomous agents; trust/safety failures.
theses.description: Everyone will have personal AI assistants. Agent-to-agent commerce reshapes infrastructure needs, kills some businesses, creates new ones.

theses.title: US Political Instability & Decline
theses.implications: BEARISH on USD long-term. BULLISH on gold and safe havens. BULLISH on defense short-term. VIX elevated.
theses.description: Trump cognitive decline creating extreme instability. US heading toward severe internal conflict. Constant conflict with allies eroding trust.

theses.title: Europe Decouples from US, China Dominates
theses.implications: BULLISH on EU defense (RHM.DE, BA.L, LDO.MI, HO.PA, SAAB-B.ST). BEARISH on US companies dependent on allied cooperation.
theses.invalidation: US policy reversal; China economic collapse; EU fragmentation.
theses.description: Europe distances from US due to broken trust. China consolidated center of power. Europe builds independent defense, tech sovereignty.
